header.gameNote: OREGON STATE CLASSIC AT CORVALLIS OR

article.headline: Portland 76, Idaho St. 52
article.story: CORVALLIS, Ore. (AP) -- Sherrard Watson had 18 points and six rebounds Saturday to lead Portland to a 76-52 win over Idaho State in the Beaver Invitational at Gill Coliseum. Nik Raivio added 15 points and Robin Smeulders 13 for Portland, which won its first game in the three-team round-robin tournament. The Pilots (2-3) play host Oregon State on Sunday. Oregon State defeated Idaho State 61-56 on Friday. Chron Tatum had 14 points for Idaho State (1-5). Portland used a 12-2 run to increase a 11-point halftime lead to 19 at 54-39 on a Luke Sikma 3-pointer with 13 minutes remaining in the game. Idaho State got no closer than 15 the rest of the way. The final margin, 24 points, was Portland's largest advantage of the game. Portland shot 24 of 54 from the field, including 9 of 23 from 3-point range. Idaho State was 19 of 56. Portland had a 45-26 rebounding advantage.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
